nodes.text: Fathalians were human immigrants who inhabited the Outer Rim world of JanFathal. Many of them resided in JanFathal's capital, Athar, and were known as Athari. They had dark skin, and wore their hair in neatly-coiled plaits.
During the Clone Wars, the Fathalians wished for democratic change, but they were told by Armand Isard that their request would have to wait until the conclusion of the war.
